SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.util.tinyexr

Class EXRImage

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.util.tinyexr.EXRImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class EXRImage extends Struct implements NativeResource

Layout


 struct EXRImage {
     EXRTile * tiles();
     struct _EXRImage * next_level();
     int level_x();
     int level_y();
     unsigned char ** images();
     int width;
     int height;
     int num_channels;
     int num_tiles;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • EXRImage

      public EXRImage(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a EXRImage instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.

  • Method Details

      public int sizeof()
      Description copied from class: Struct
      Returns sizeof(struct).
      Specified by:
      sizeof in class Struct

    • tiles

      @Nullable public EXRTile.Buffer tiles()
      tiled pixel data. The application must reconstruct image from tiles manually. NULL if scanline format.

    • next_level

      @Nullable public EXRImage next_level()
      NULL if scanline format or image is the last level.

      x level index
